pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Agreement in Method Comparison Studies // Methods (standard and advanced) for analysis of agreement between measurement methods. These cover Bland-Altman plots, Deming regression, Lin's Total deviation index, and difference-on- average regression. See Carstensen B. (2010) "Comparing Clinical Measurement Methods: A Practical Guide (Statistics in Practice)" doi:10.1002/9780470683019 for more information.
